iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+macOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 10.0+

```
static func build_flatMap<LHS, RHS, Wrapped, Result>(

) -> PredicateExpressions.OptionalFlatMap<LHS, Wrapped, RHS, Result> where LHS : PredicateExpression, RHS : PredicateExpression, Result == RHS.Output, LHS.Output == Wrapped?
```
